Intellectual Property is not only the most importance business rule of the :Brain economy era:, but also one of the most important agreements among WTO members.  This course includes the basic three subjects of Intellectual Property:Patent, Trademark, and Copyright.  In order to accommodate the learning background for most of NTUT students, the contents of this course will focus more on the practical practice of the Patennt.  In addition, it also includes the subject of "how to activate your creativeness:so as to make students can use what they learn, "Intellectual Property:, to protect their intellectual work.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002014或負責教授同意。燃料及燃燒、基本熱傳理論、蒸汽動力廠、壓縮機、燃氣輪機、內燃機、汽油引擎、柴油引擎、冷凍空調循環。
description.en: Fuels and Combustion, Principles of Heat Transfer, Steam Power Plants Compressors, Gas Turbines, Internal Combustion Engines: Gasoline Engines, Diesel Engines, Refrigeration And Air Conditioning.

description.zh: 二十一世紀是中國人的世紀，全球最多的人口，第三大的土地，與台灣如此的近，政治、經濟、軍事、文化發展對台灣均有一定的影響。統一？台獨？無論如何，身為今日在台灣的知識份子，應對它有所瞭解。課程內容包括：中國共產黨的建立與發展、政制體制、教育科學文化發展、經濟展望、國防軍事建設、兩岸關係等。
description.en: This course is designed lets our students have a comprehensive understanding of the Mainland China. Introduced the developing history of Chinese Communism Party ; the organization of political ; the status of economics ; the development of science &　eductaion;the military construction; the policy of one country two systems;and the relationship of two - sides of straits ---。

description.zh: 本課程主要在從人生內在活動面向使學生明瞭宗教與人生的關係。首先探究人生的意義與特性，次則經由對宗教哲學，比較宗教學與宗教現象學的瞭解，來分析人生的問題。內容特別強調文化對人生的影響，宗教乃是深層文化原則所繫，同時人生問題也能引發宗教的適應與發展等等。
description.en: The purpose of the course is to approach of " Action Immanent ", enabling students to realize the relation of religions and life. First, to study the issues on the meaning and characteristics of life. Second,through the understanding of "Philosophy of Religion "、" Comparative Religion " and "Phenomenology of Religion ", to analyze the problems of life. Emphasis is on culture and the influence of life, as religion is a foundation supporting culture where problems of life can stimulate the adaptation and development of religion.

name.en: The Cultural History of Chinese Medicine

description.zh: 本課程結合考古發現、出土文物、傳世圖書及近人研究，討論中國這塊地域自有文字出現以來的醫療文化變遷。經由本課程學生可以瞭解傳統中國社的醫療知識和社會、文化與政治間的可能關係。
description.en: The contents of this course include archaeological discoveries, unearthed artifacts, written documents and recent literature, and focuses on the medical and cultural changes in Chinese history. Students who take this course will be able to comprehend the medical knowledge as well as the interrelations among social, cultural and political dimensions in traditional China.

description.zh: 日常生活中，科技和化學伴隨著人類的成長，除了吃、喝、玩樂外，[用]也是很重要的一部份，例如我們時時刻刻在用的洗面乳、洗髮乳、沐浴乳、洗碗精、洗衣精等等的民生用品。探討這些化學對於環境的影響，並透過簡易的化學實驗來了解到民生化學用品與環境的關聯。了解日常生活中拋棄的廢棄物，如何轉換成有效的資源，達到綠色循環的經濟概念。
description.en: In our daily lives, science and chemistry develop and progress along with people.  However, life is not just about eating, drinking, playing, and entertainment.  "Usage" is also very important, specifically when it comes to the facial cleansers, body washes, dish and laundry detergents, and other cleaning supplies that we use.  From simple tests to determine the effects of chemicals on the environment, we understand how discarded daily articles can be transformed into effective resources, thus putting into practice a green recycling economy.

description.zh: 創業者在新創事業時，須考慮消費者對新創事業產品(新創產品)之瞭解及接受程度。如果能在創業之初對消費者進行新創產品之消費者行為調查，可使新創事業在成立之初即找出目標顧客群，並分析出目標顧客的消費偏好，例如：對新創產品的品質要求、功能偏好、購買可能金額、消費通路類別等，創業者可依所瞭解目標顧客的消費偏好，規劃適當的行銷方案，而提高創業成功的機會。
description.en: Entrepreneurs should consider consumers’ understanding and acceptance of new products (innovative products) in their new ventures. If a start-up company conducts consumer behavior survey in the beginning, the new business is able to identify the target customer base from the start, and analyze the target consumer preferences, including quality requirements, functional preferences, amount of possible purchase, types of consumer access. By understanding target consumer preferences, entrepreneurs can plan appropriate marketing programs, and improve business opportunities for success.

description.zh:
「時間學」是一門相當實際的課程，其目的在教導學瞭解時間的意義，提升時間使用的價值以善用時間，充實自己的生命與生活。
本課程內容提供時間理論相關的觀念與方法，希望同學於課程中，一方面從學中做，一方面從做中學，而達到「時間學」增進個人健康，促進人際關係，有效處理公私事宜的三大功能。
description.en:
"Time Science" is a very practical course and its purpose is to teach students the meaning of time with a view to increasing the value of time utility so as to make good use of time and enrich one's own life and living.
The contents of the course provide the concept and method relating to time ethic and hope students to learn and work so  that "Time Sciecne" may attain three major functions--increase personal physical and mental health, promote interpersonal relationship and effectively handle public/private affairs.

description.zh:
通識教育之核心精神為「博雅」，其中「博」指的是知識廣度。
是以建構多元認知及探討，正是拓展知識廣度的重要方法。
本講座課程係以「單一主題」統領「多面知識」的方式進行授課。課程領域為社會科學，由六至八個相關單元組成，不同專家學者授課。除課堂授課外，得實行「實地體驗教學」，安排參觀與實習。
description.en: "Erudition & Refinement" is among the most essential in the field of General Education. "Erudition" refers to the width of knowledge-also a very important approach in enriching human experience by building multi-dimensional recognition of culture. The Lecture focuses on a "single theme" through the teaching/learning of "a diversity of knowledge. The course areas cover social science. The lecture will consist of six to eight units, which will be taught by different experts and scholars. In addition to the classroom teaching, there may also be "Experiencing Teaching On the Spot"-or rather, a visit to the location in question or practicum.

notes: 創創/社哲向度；幸福科技與創業創新

name.en: The History of Daily Life in Pre-Modern China

description.zh: 本課程透過專題的演講、史料的研讀與討論，探究中國古代庶民的生活特色，並培養學生閱讀與分析史料的能力。
description.en: This course aims at exploring the history of daily life of intellectuals in pre-modern China. Lectures focus on selective important aspects of socio-cultural life. Students are required to do reading and discussing in class.

description.zh:
服務創新是利用新的設想、新的技術手段轉變成更新並且改進過後的服務方式。從社會的角度而言，服務創新是創造和開發人類自身價值,提高和完善生存質量，改善社會生態環境的活動。因此，服務創新通過滿足物質需求、精神和心理需求，並提供解決問題的能力，保障人們的精神和心理上的健康，得到滿足感和成就感。 本課程旨在啟發修課同學創業的興趣並協助修課同學思考新創事業如何提供改善對人類的服務。 新創企業已發展成熟的企業是不一樣，主要是因為新創事業的資源有限，創業家必須同時兼顧許多面向並回應顧客所需。

本課程旨在協助修課同學思考創建企業應注意的各種面向評估自己的創能力。 課程包含了三大部份，
第一部份為服務創新與創業概念啟發，介紹世界各國服務創新創業實例與模範；服務創新的思路。
第二部份在辨別服務創新市場機會與發展市場，介紹新興市場，服務創新能做甚麼
第三部份為新創事業行銷管理。行銷活動能夠將企業的產品及服務傳遞給顧客；並將產品、服務及企業本身的資訊帶到市場上；將顧客資訊回饋給企業。創業行銷管理能夠幫助創業者向潛在投資者及企業夥伴銷售創意以獲得資源，也讓創業家透過創新的商業手法來充分利用稀少的資源。
description.en:
The course intends to encourage the participant to become an entrepreneur and handle with these challenges. A start-up company is different from well-developed one due to limited resources. Usually, to response customer’s requirement, the entrepreneur must take multiple criteria into consideration simultaneously. Managers must have excellent leadership skills in order to run a start-up company which has lots of challenges, such as: niche market located and brand diffusion.

The course includes three parts: 
Part I build students’ concept about service innovation and entrepreneurship.
Part II is about service innovation market identification. 
Part III is about service marketing management of a start-up company. 

The efficient marketing activities enable business to approach customer’s requirement, to bring their customer product (or services) and get customer’s feedback. Also, the marketing management helps entrepreneur to reach their potential investor to obtain more resou

description.zh: 人類社會中的經濟活動愈來愈錯綜，人與人之間的經濟關係也愈來愈複雜，但無非都是為求經濟問題的解決。如何將有限的資源在諸多可行的途徑中，選擇最有利、最能發揮滿足人們慾望的效果，乃是身為「經濟人」的萬物之靈所努力的目標。本課程提供學習者分析經濟現象的工具，掌握經濟發展的脈動，以便在現代經濟社會中立於不敗之地。
description.en: In human society economic activity is getting more and more complicated and economic relationship between people is also getting more and more complicated but all are to seek for the solution of economic problems. Among a number feasible ways how to choose the best way that can make best use of limited resources to satisfy people's desire shall be the goal for human being as "economic persons" making effort to fulfill. The course enables students to learn the tools for the analysis of economic situation, the way of grasping the wave of economic development in Taiwan so as to win in the modern economic society.

description.zh:
使同學具備良好的造形能力，對於今後從事各類型之設計、繪製圖表等均有幫助。教學內容包括筆法及明度練習，室內靜物寫生，室外樹木、建築物之寫生。
教學方法：先練習運用鉛筆，使其表現各種筆觸、輕重，再要求造形之準確度，達到形態和質感的表現正確，以及構圖有美感的能力。先由老師示範，而後同學練習
description.en:
Equip students with the ability of styling so that their designing and drawing ability can be improved. 
The teaching material used for this class includes stroke and chiaroscuro, drawing of still life, and nature painting outside. Teaching method: Practice how to use a pencil for the demonstrating various touches in light and heavy strokes.  Students shall learn how to perform  precise styling,  correct expression of formation and personality, and a beautiful configuration. The instructor will give a demonstration first and then students shall follow and learn.

description.zh:
通識教育之核心精神為「博雅」，其中「博」指的是知識廣度。
是以建構多元認知及探討，正是拓展知識廣度的重要方法。
本講座課程係以「單一主題」統領「多面知識」的方式進行授課。課程領域為人文科學，由六至八個相關單元組成，不同專家學者授課。除課堂授課外，得實行「實地體驗教學」，安排參觀與實習。
description.en: "Erudition & Refinement" is among the most essential in the field of General Education. "Erudition" refers to the width of knowledge-also a very important approach in enriching human experience by building multi-dimensional recognition of culture. The Lecture focuses on a "single theme" through the teaching/learning of "a diversity of knowledge. The course areas cover human science. The lecture will consist of six to eight units, which will be taught by different experts and scholars. In addition to the classroom teaching, there may also be "Experiencing Teaching On the Spot"-or rather, a visit to the location in question or practicum.

notes: 文史/文化向度；歐陸人文與社會

description.zh: 資訊法律課程將讓同學了解網路資訊社會中各層面的相關法律議題。本課程內容著重於各種網路法律問題，例如資訊安全、網路契約的訂定、網域名稱、數位化著作權、商標權，隱私權以及電腦犯罪種類及防治的介紹。另外，本課程也以個案方式，敘述電腦資訊的相關法律問題，並從中了解虛擬世界與現實世界的法律規範，同時測試自己是否具備足夠的資訊法律知識，能夠在快速變遷的資訊社會中立足與發展。
description.en: The course of Information Laws is designed for the students to familiarize such legal issues in most of the aspects available in the current world as information security, internet contracts, domain names, digital copy rights, trademark ownership, individual privacy and the genre & prevention in relation to computers. In addition, we discuss individual cases to further understand the nature of legal issues concerning computerized information. Hopefully, we learn the legal disciplines existent in the virtual and real worlds; besides, the students are supposed to equip themselves with sufficient legal knowledge so that they can survive and thus keep growing in the ever-changing information society.

description.zh: 「社會心理學」主要探討的重點在於日常生活，社會刺激以及情境如何影響個人行為，它需要經過科學的方法進行研究，藉以預測一個人在某種情境下，可能會出現哪些行為。其涉及的學科相當廣泛，除了一般心理學的理論之外，尚包含社會科學哲學、文化人類學、倫理學、環境心理學、團體動力學等相關論述。課程強調理論與實務結合，提升學生參與社會的知能。
description.en: Social Psychology is focus on social stimuli and how situations affect individual behavior everyday life. In order to predict a person’s behavior in a situation, we need to research by scientific methods.  It covers a wide range of professional areas, not only the theories of social psychology but also philosophy of social science, cultural anthropology, ethics, environmental psychology, group dynamics. This course emphasizes the combination of theory and practice to enhance students’ abilities to participate in society.

description.zh: 現代科技文明進展得非常迅速，這使得一般人日常生活中，可能經常享受到這些科技所帶來的便利，但卻習以為常，以為天生下來就是這樣的，這些現代的科技，可能是關於電機的、物理的、化工的、光電的、材料的......，更有可能同時涉及了其他許多個領域，更可能有許多人希望能夠了解這些科技的來龍去脈，一窺其究竟，人類在沒有土木工程學之前，早已能建築萬里長城和金字塔，許許多多的科技是由嘗試錯誤，經驗的累積逐漸得來的，當然，隨著知識的不斷窮究其理，"知而後行"的高科技也就會越來越多，我們在這裡也試圖去追蹤各項科技的演進史與現況方面讓大家知道羅馬不是一天所造成的，另一方面也讓大家有從另一個角度重新思考的機會，也許這些科技進化到現在，還稱不上成熟的階段，您也許可以找出另一種更好的方法來改進它們！
description.en: Modern technology is growing fast. People thus enjoy the convenience in company with the technology—which they do and they just take it for granted to do. It may have something to do with electrical engineering, physics, chemical engineering, electro-optical engineering, materials…Some problems involves more than one field. People are curious about the technology and willing to know how to solve the problems. Human beings are able to build the pyramids and the Long Walls before they know anything about civil engineering—knowledge actually piled up by trial and error or accumulated experience. As knowledge expands, hi-end technology which requires “know-how” becomes more popular. In this course, we try to trace the history and the current situations: “Rome was not built in a day.” On the other hand, we might take another chance to RE-think a deeper problem: technology evolves without getting to maturity. Human beings will be enforced to find some other ways to improve it.

description.zh: 電影號稱第八藝術，音樂居其要津。一般人看電影，往往只關心情節發展、忘掉音樂的存在，就戲劇的整體性來說，不免是一種損失。如果我們能兼顧到音樂在電影中的功能和內涵，多注意配樂者的巧思，必能獲致更深刻的感動。　　電影中的配樂，從默劇即已開始具備，有聲電影發明後，與語言同步，更見多采多姿，電影的戲劇張力也益加豐富，現代有名的電影配樂，甚至已被等同為古典音樂，透過視聽媒體廣為流傳，值得我們好好探討，本課程的主旨即在於此。
description.en: Cinema is usually referred as the 8th art where music plays a significant part. It is always a big loss for film viewers to pay too much attention to the dramatic events of the movie story and to be ignorant of the music in films. If film viewers can be more aware of the function and implication of the music in them and think more over how the role of music plays, they no doubt should be touched more deeply. The music-composing in the films is rooted back in the days of silent movies. As soon as movies are equipped with audio sounds, music is placed synchronously with languages, which help to make movies more colorful and exciting. It is true that some music in the well-known movies is even considered to be "classical." With the rapid spread of audio-visual media, this particular type of music has become more popular. We will focus on this variety of music in this course. .

description.zh: 電影號稱第八藝術，音樂居其要津。一般人看電影，往往只關心情節發展、忘掉音樂的存在，就戲劇的整體性來說，不免是一種損失。如果我們能兼顧到音樂在電影中的功能和內涵，多注意配樂者的巧思，必能獲致更深刻的感動。　　電影中的配樂，從默劇即已開始具備，有聲電影發明後，與語言同步，更見多采多姿，電影的戲劇張力也益加豐富，現代有名的電影配樂，甚至已被等同為古典音樂，透過視聽媒體廣為流傳，值得我們好好探討，本課程的主旨即在於此。
description.en: Cinema is usually referred as the 8th art where music plays a significant part. It is always a big loss for film viewers to pay too much attention to the dramatic events of the movie story and to be ignorant of the music in films. If film viewers can be more aware of the function and implication of the music in them and think more over how the role of music plays, they no doubt should be touched more deeply. The music-composing in the films is rooted back in the days of silent movies. As soon as movies are equipped with audio sounds, music is placed synchronously with languages, which help to make movies more colorful and exciting. It is true that some music in the well-known movies is even considered to be "classical." With the rapid spread of audio-visual media, this particular type of music has become more popular. We will focus on this variety of music in this course. .

description.zh:
面對科技發展日新月異，社會急驟變遷的新世紀，只習得專業上的一技之長，已不足以和協圓滿地實踐有意義的人生。有鑑於此，乃以生涯發展與生涯諮商的理論與研究為基礎，配合學生的發展，希翼能透過教育的歷程，使學生的專業知識能和未來的工作與生活規劃，產生有意義的聯結，進而為學生提供一個短程與長程的生涯發展與選擇的準備與指引。
授課內容包括生涯理念介紹、興趣、性格、價值觀探索，生
涯決定因素，生涯技巧，生涯角色調適，生涯選擇與規劃技
巧，生涯訪談，生涯高原調適，轉型期調適，性別、職業歧
視，雙生涯家庭，就業準備等主要生涯課題的研討與習作。
description.en: In face of a new century with continuous scientific development and rapid social changes, to learn one single professional skill is not enough to fulfill a meaningful life in a harmonic and satisfactory manner. In view of this, based on the theory and research of career development and consultation in association with the development of students,  it is hoped to produce a meaningful linking between their professional knowledge and job and life planning through the course of eucation, and further to provide them a preparation and guide for short and long-range career development and choice. The contents of the course include the discussion and exercise related to major career topics such as introduction to the concept of career, the discussion of interest, character and value, decisive factors of career, skills of career, role adjustment in career, career choice and planning skill, career interview, uphill adjustment in career, adjustment in transit period, sex and occupation.

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生尊重與欣賞不同族群、不同時空、不同價值觀所產生的音樂而設。藉由對音樂元素、本質的認知及介紹，欣賞各時期作曲家之代表作品，培養西方音樂的基本常識，建立音樂欣賞的專業態度。教學目標：1.提高學生音樂欣賞的素養，充實其音樂生活的內涵，2.激發學生對音樂的興趣，培育愛樂人口，增進社會祥和的原動力，3.介紹古今中外音樂名家名作，啟發學生對音樂創作的認知與敬重，4.建立學生對古典音樂、民族音樂、應用音樂及通俗音樂等不同類型音樂的正確認知與包容力，培養世界性的音樂觀。授課內容：1.概論, 2.歌樂, 3.器樂, 4.儀式音樂, 5.舞蹈音樂, 6.戲劇音樂。
description.en: This course aims to cultivate students' ability to appreciate music of different ethnic groups, different time and place, different value systems. Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

description.zh:
一、教學目標：幫助同學把毛筆字練好，進而培養欣賞能力。
二、其教學內容包含1.鑑賞相關知識。2.名碑帖之認識3.篆刻、裱褙    之簡介4.行書、楷書之臨模與創作5.書論之研讀。
三、評量則以整學期先後習作之比較出情訂定其成績。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to improve students' ability of appreciating Chinese calligraphy as well as the practice of handwriting skill. The contents include: 1. The knowledge of appreciation 2. Introduction of masterpieces. 3. Introductory studies of seal carving and traditional Chinese picture mounting. 4. Chinese calligraphy practice 5.reference materials study. Grading will be based on the improvement of students` works through all semester.

description.zh: 人的身體一接觸自然界，便開始各個器官的功能，人不如機器，無法汰換零件，加上身體機能遇到問題之後，許多人往往不知如何處理應對，甚至身體出現徵兆也渾然不知。所以此科目最主要的目的是希望藉由對醫學的認識，讓大學生們更瞭解自己的身體，進而保護並時時自我偵測身體是否正常運作，要培養健全的大學生，而不是只會讀書的大病貓。
description.en: Once the human body contacts the natural environment, the organs of the body begin to function.  But the human body can not change it's organizational like machine.  So when our body's function is in trouble, we always have no idea how to solve it, either to find out.  One of these course's objection is to let college students understanding their own body by learning some important medical concepts.  We hope that our country both has excellent and healthy college students,  and not all sick.

description.zh: 為建構多元化台灣社會的民主觀念，並拓展台灣政治發展的時間深度，以加強傳統與現代的有機聯繫，本課程擬從以下方向發展：政治生活與社會生活、政治文化與政治社會化、民粹主義與政治生活、公共意見與投票行為、民主憲政與人權保障、司法正義與司法革新、憲政運作與政治發展、政治秩序與政治發展、中國歷代政治得失等。
description.en: To study the time length of the political development of Taiwan and strength of the relationship between the traditional and modern period. Also the establishment of democracy in a multilateral society is to be studied. This class will study the basis of Taiwan society, and explore the following items: political and social life, political culture, socialization, populism. Also included are public opinion and voting orientation, constitution and human rights, the justice and reformation of judiciary, the operation of the constitution and political development, political order and development and an analysis of Chinese politial development.

description.zh: 面對日益複雜的社會現象與社會組織，生活規範已由傳統的道德習俗，逐漸代之以法律倫理，生活在現代化的社會，有必要從認知法理、遵守法律，進而要求落實法治。俾政府施政依法而治，社會倫理得以重建，個人權益亦獲得確實的保障。本課程兼顧理論與實例的探討，包括法律的理念與概念、法律與社會生活各層面的關聯性、現行法體制的基本認識、法治生活的檢視與展望。
description.en: Facing increasingly complicated social phenomena and organization, norms of life are governed by laws instead of traditional moral customs. Living in modern society, it is necessary to have a better understanding of the law, so that people will abide by the law and further thoroughly implement the legal system to ensure that the government administration may be performed in accordance with the law. In this way, social ethic may be re-established and individual's benefit may be protected. The discussion in the course covers theory and examples, including the concept of the law, law and politic, law and society, law and life, etc.

description.zh: 婚姻是一般人所必經的過程，家庭是生活的場所，關係著人生的幸福與美滿。本課程強調美滿婚姻與幸福家庭是一門學問，因此，課程內容包括：對婚姻與家庭有正確的認知、積極的態度、完整的規劃，並培養有認真努力去實踐的方法與能力。如何追求真正的快樂與幸福？除了在婚姻與家庭中追求平等化、合理化、自由化、公平化外，自我成長、相互尊重都是本課程的學習目標，以協助學生思考婚姻與家庭的終生大事。
description.en: Marriage is a process that most people will go through.  Family is where you belong to, and where the satisfaction and happiness come from. We believe that it is a kind of scholarship to have a high-quality marriage and a wonderful family.  The contents of this course include having the correct understanding of marriage and family, cultivating positive attitude, developing complete plans, and realizing them with all efforts. This course will help students think totally about marriage and family, learn to pursue equality, reasonableness and liberty, keep growing and respect each other, so that we can obtain the real delight and happiness.

description.zh: 現代人的健康問題50％以上導因於生活型態與行為模式，傳統以疾病治療為主的醫療模式已無法因應目前民眾的健康需求，健康促進、危急救護等觀念正被廣泛應用，本課程內容包含三大部分，包括「健康及其影響因素」、「健康促進相關議題」、「安全教育與急救」，藉由系統性健康教育與資訊傳播，使學生能習得正確健康知能及技能，幫助學生建立健康行為模式，使其健康能獲得更好的自我控制。
description.en: More than 50% of modern men’s health problems attributes from living style and behavior. The tradition way for curing illness has failed to fulfill people’s requirements. Conceptions such as health promoting and emergencies dealing are now being wildly used. This course mainly focuses on three issues, including “health and its affected cause,” “related issues on health promotion”, and “safety education and emergency treatment.” Through systematical health education and information spreading, students acquire the correct health knowledge and skills, to help students lead a healthy life and to get a better self-control on own health.

description.zh: 創業與財務概論課程的主要目的是要使學生了解如何在企業創立的時候，透過財務技術，來評估企業的經營績效與價值。本課程將介紹以下內容：(1) 公司創業的財務報表與科目報導與分析 (2) 基本創業財務分析理論 (3) 公司的償債能力、獲利能力、經營能力、資本結構、現金流量的分析 (4) 特殊行業的財務報表分析 (5) 探討我國最近發佈的會計準則公報對企業與投資人的影響。
description.en: The goal of the introduction to entrepreneurship and finance course is to help students, when the company is in the stage of entrepreneurship, evaluate the performance and measure the values of firms by financial statements. The topics of this course includes (1) entrepreneurship financial reports and analysis; (2) basic entrepreneurship financial statement analysis; 3) solvency, profitability, business performance, financial structure and cash flow analysis; 4) financial statement analysis of special industries 5) recent developments of GAAP.

description.zh: 兩性關係是人際關係的核心問題，它關係著交友的態度、婚姻生活的幸福與社會的祥和。本課程由對兩性差異性的了解為基礎，以尊重為原則，在平等互助的精神中，確定兩性關係的和諧。本課程內容包括理論與實際的配合，儘量以生活化的內容貫穿其間，並注重課程內容的可實踐性，以協助學生處理兩性關係的難題。
description.en: Gender Studies is a core issue of interpersonal relationship.  It involves attitudes toward making friends, marriage and social tranquility.  This course aims to help students become aware of sex difference, understand the importance of respect, equality and mutual-help between sexes.  The contents of the course will cover both theory and practice, providing cases and examples related to our daily life so as to help students handle problems when getting along with the opposite sex.

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生尊重與欣賞不同族群、不同時空、不同價值觀所產生的音樂而設。藉由對音樂元素、本質的認知及介紹，欣賞各時期作曲家之代表作品，培養西方音樂的基本常識，建立音樂欣賞的專業態度。教學目標：1.提高學生音樂欣賞的素養，充實其音樂生活的內涵，2.激發學生對音樂的興趣，培育愛樂人口，增進社會祥和的原動力，3.介紹古今中外音樂名家名作，啟發學生對音樂創作的認知與敬重，4.建立學生對古典音樂、民族音樂、應用音樂及通俗音樂等不同類型音樂的正確認知與包容力，培養世界性的音樂觀。授課內容：1.概論, 2.歌樂, 3.器樂, 4.儀式音樂, 5.舞蹈音樂, 6.戲劇音樂。
description.en: This course aims to cultivate students' ability to appreciate music of different ethnic groups, different time and place, different value systems. Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

description.zh: 勞動法包括與勞動市場、個別勞動關係及集體勞動關係等方面有關勞工工作權益的法律規範，透過本課程可以學習正確的勞動法律觀念和知識，同時培養縝密思辨的能力，將課堂上所習得的知識應用落實在日常生活中，來保障並維護自己或他人的職場權益。
description.en: The legal specialty called Labor Law can be define as “the legal regulation of the labor market , individual labor relations and collective employer-employee relations. “labor market” pertains to market in which employers and workers exchange labor . Through this course , students can not only get correct concepts of " Labor Law " , but learn to protect their / others' rights in work place.

name.en: Cross Strait Relations and International Politics

description.zh:
本課程由全球化框架來檢視兩岸關係的演進、現況、及發展趨勢。
由政治、經濟、乃至社會心理層面分析海峽兩岸錯綜複雜的互動關係。
並檢視國際政治經濟體系中，美國與日本兩大國對兩岸關係的影響。
description.en:
This introductory course on the complex cross-strait interactions will examine
Taiwan’s role in the intricate web of international power politics; as well as the structure of hegemonic power rivalry, particularly Sino-US-Japan triangle, and its impact on cross strait relations. The material will cover the evolution, status quo, and developmental path of the cross strait relations in a global framework.

description.zh: 以攝影來進行社會介入的創作作品，在當代藝術的領域中已經不再陌生，而這樣的發展也促成在社會學領域中越來越多關於攝影與社會的討論。本課程主要分為兩大部分，第一部分將從攝影史發展脈絡，來談攝影的社會使用，第二部分則是探討在當代藝術中，如何將攝影作為一種社會實踐的方式。除課堂講解和集體討論外，本課程也將透過實作討論同學的攝影計畫和作品，期使讓同學對於攝影，可以產生新的社會性思考，並開始進行影像與社會介入的嘗試。
description.en: In the field of contemporary art, photography has been developing into a way of social intervention. This trend also contributes to triggering more dialogues concerning “photography and society” in the discipline of sociology. The course mainly includes two parts: photography history and the photography as a social practice. In the first section, along with the history of photography, the social usages of photography will be introduced. In the second section, how photography art can be a social practice and what kinds of practice have been explored will be . In addition to class lectures and group discussions, the course requires all students to complete their individual photo project in the end of semester and their works will be presented in class.

description.zh: 日常生活中，科技和化學伴隨著人類的成長，除了吃、喝、玩樂外，[用]也是很重要的一部份，例如我們時時刻刻在用的洗面乳、洗髮乳、沐浴乳、洗碗精、洗衣精等等的民生用品。探討這些化學對於環境的影響，並透過簡易的化學實驗來了解到民生化學用品與環境的關聯。了解日常生活中拋棄的廢棄物，如何轉換成有效的資源，達到綠色循環的經濟概念。
description.en: In our daily lives, science and chemistry develop and progress along with people.  However, life is not just about eating, drinking, playing, and entertainment.  "Usage" is also very important, specifically when it comes to the facial cleansers, body washes, dish and laundry detergents, and other cleaning supplies that we use.  From simple tests to determine the effects of chemicals on the environment, we understand how discarded daily articles can be transformed into effective resources, thus putting into practice a green recycling economy.

description.zh: 本課程教導學生了解新創事業在智慧財產權與專利管理的基本知識，課程的教導將朝下列方向進行: (1) 新創事業智慧財產權的基本觀念與實務， (2) 專利資訊分析，(3) 專利演化與發展 ，(4) 創意產出，(5) 專利申請與保護 (6) 專利佈局 (7) 專利侵權鑑定 (8) 專利迴避設計 (9) 案例討論與分析。
description.en: This course teaches students Intellectual Property Rights and patent management for Entrepreneurship. The course includes topics as follows: (1) Basic knowledge and practices of Entrepreneurship Intellectual Property Rights; (2) The analysis of patent information; (3) The evolution and development for patent; (4) Innovative idea generation; (5) Application and protection of patent (6) Patent strategy (7) Patent violation，(8) Patent avoidance，(9) Cases study.

description.zh:
透過點子激發、設計思考、Hook Model 的學習、假設驗證的過程以及 Business Model Canvas 等方法，學會如何驗證與思索創業計畫，進而撰寫簡潔而有效的創業計畫書。
當今時代有許多創業發想，均花費許多時間在撰寫創業計劃書，然而最近的矽谷創業圈已經不再流行一本又一本的創業計劃書（Business Plan / Business Proposal），更重要的其實是如何透過假設的驗證、市場的調查（或理解），以及仔細的規劃設計一個有效的創業計畫，比創業計劃書的撰寫更重要。
如同奇點大學所教導 – 如果能改變十億人，那麼必能產生十億元的價值。反之，如果要能產生價值十億的「創業計劃書」，必要先能產生價值十億的「創業計畫」。「書/寫」乃是本門課程的附屬建物，實體建築乃有效「創業計畫」之生成、驗證是也乎。
description.en: A good business plan is build upon a good innovative idea and a good storytelling first; then it will also need certain reasonable structure that can be well understand and clearly present the business idea and its roll out plan. That’s the spirit of BP (Business Plan / Business Proposal). In this course, we will NOT focus on the representation of BP, but focus on the business idea/plan itself.

name.zh: 國際觀培養-馬來文化與語言
name.en: Emerging Market Series: Getting to know Malaysia

description.zh: 在全球金融海嘯後，已開發國家經濟成長趨緩，新興亞洲國家特別是東協五國經濟成長迅速，藉由傳授東南亞四小語以協助學生拓展東南亞的就業版圖並促進台灣與東南亞國家之間的經貿關係。本課程旨在培養學生的基本溝通能力，運用馬來語來與當地馬來母語者打招呼、了解馬來文化、建立人際關係、購物、敘述事物…等，以此來協助學生前往馬來西亞就業作為兩國的經濟橋樑。
description.en:
In order to embrace economic development of globalization, especially in Asian and Southeast Asian countries, there is a need to introduce and equip our students not only with the basic local language but also to understand the local culture so as to strengthen the economic tie between Taiwan and the Asian countries and to enhance the employment opportunities of our students in these Asian countries.
This course aims to help students to understand and develop basic communication skills by utilizing Bahasa Malaysia (Malaysian language) to communicate with Malaysian in terms of greeting, business contact establishment, interpersonal communication, etc. Historical and geographical backgrounds of Malaysia and their local cultures will also be introduced.

name.zh: 國際觀培養─泰國文化與語言II
name.en: Development of global perspective: Thai culture and language II

description.zh: 課程以培養泰語溝通能力、激發學習泰語興趣，以及跨文化理解為宗旨。課程架構包括泰國語言教學及元化議題討論，使其在具備泰語溝通實力之外，更能對泰國各方面情勢與文化、思想、禮節、風俗習慣、宗教禁忌等，都具有深度認識。
description.en: This course aims to help students build the foundation of speaking Thai, and arouse students’ interests in learning Thai. Also, it helps students get to know cross-cultural differences. In addition to learning Thai, students have to discuss the issues related to Thai culture. Accordingly, students are not only able to make conversations, but have further understanding of Thai culture, thinking, manners, customs and religious taboos etc.

notes: 優先開放修畢106-1國際觀培養-泰國文化與語言Ⅰ之學生

name.en: Lecture: Increase capacity for career exploration

description.zh: 本校為強化學生的就業能力，加強學生的職場競爭力，開設「職涯進擊講座」之課程，藉由業界主管與人員分享面試技巧、溝通表達、職場自我行銷、生涯規劃及介紹不同種類的工作模式，如派遣、公職、舒活族、獵人頭公司、國外企業等，提升學生對於國內外職場的認識，並進一步提升學生的就業率與競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to enhance student’s competitive ability in the workplace. The course contents include tips of interview, self-marketing in the workplace and the planning of the career life etc. By the topics, students will be equipped with a variety of presentation skills that needed in the workplace to raise the employment rate.

notes: 上課6週，每週3小時；限大三以上

name.zh: 國際觀培養:跨越疆界，改變由我
name.en: Feast for the global perspective—change starts within you

description.zh: 本課程藉由邀請校內外之社會、政治、經濟、文化等專家學者與莘莘學子們進行相互交流，透過「全球議題」、「文化學習」等主題之進階探討，培養學生世界公民之意識，重新定位自己，以適應全球化生活與培養終身競爭力。
description.en: We invite the domestic speakers, as the outstanding scholars of cross-cultural communication, to share their knowledge and experiences with students. By exploring the global issues such as social, cultural, political or economic studies, the course makes students learn further about the world, and inspires students to strengthen their independent thinking and global perspective.

description.zh: 本課程將邀請校內外專業業師講授簡報圖表觀念、簡報邏輯與架構、簡報技巧與有效溝通力等內容，並於期末辦理簡報發表作為本課成期末評分方式。
description.en: nill

notes: 教室：集思北科大會議中心(億光301)/上課6週

name.zh: 文化創新:文化資產保存的新思維
name.en: Culture Innovation: New Perspectives on Culture Asset Preservation

description.zh: 本課程以「勞動」與「影像」兩大類的文化資產保存，作為推動文化創新切入的面向。除介紹這兩大類文化資產保存如何與「常民生活」連結，並落實所謂的「公共參與」外，並將透過此新思維的引介，讓學生實地參訪與參與實作工作坊，以進一步了解現今台灣在文化資產保存的開創性案例與潛力。
description.en: In this course of culture innovation, how to connect “everyday life” and “public participation” would constitute the main threads to explore labor and visual culture asset preservation. In addition to concept introduction, on-site visit and practice workshop are included to make students further understand the new perspectives of cultural asset preservation.

description.zh: 邀聘專家開設就業模擬課程模組，演繹各行業職人百態，以職場實例進行雙向互動，讓同學增進肢體及口語表達能力，並建立正確的工作態度和職場EQ。
description.en: Outstanding industrial professional is invited to organize the career simulation program, where scenarios are designed for students to tackle the issues that are possibly faced in the future career. Proper attitude and interpersonal skills at work and be built up through the diversity of themes and scenarios, such as team building, communication and collaboration, and leadership enhancing. The body language and the communicative skills of the students are also strengthened through the programs.

description.zh: 「系統整合指標」是智慧建築標章的基礎設施指標群，是做為評定在建築物內各項自動化服務系統在系統整合上之作為、成效與效益。 本課程將培養具備建築應用子系統運作原理與設計要點及工程執行作業與管理的基礎能力。 授課之內容如下：智慧建築系統整合指標以及各應用子系統，如中央監控系統、門禁與保全系統、對講與停車場系統、資通訊系統、綜合佈線與弱電系統、照明系統與CCTV監視系統、智慧家庭與物業管理系統之規劃設計及工程執行管理。
description.en: "System integration index" is the intelligent building marker infrastructure target group, is assessed as a service in the building automation system, the integration of the system as the effectiveness and benefit. This course will train with the principle of operation and construction applications subsystem design features and engineering job execution and management of basic capabilities. Teaching content as follows: Intelligent building integrated system of indicators as well as the application subsystems, such as the central monitoring system, access control and security systems, intercom and parking systems, ICT systems, premises distribution system and electronic systems, lighting systems and CCTV surveillance systems, intelligence design and planning of family and property management systems and project execution management.

notes: 電子大四與最後一哩合開

description.zh: 使學生了解台灣廚具產業概況，廣泛邀請廚具業師講述廚具產業相關商品研發、設計、製造、銷售、服務等知識，並進行實務參訪，以作為進入廚具產業職場之就業準備。
description.en: This course introduces students the state of art of the kitchen industries in Taiwan.  In order to prepare students to work in kitchen industries, experts are invited to address issues about the design, manufacturing, sale and service of kitchen appliances.  Some field trips are also arranged.

notes: 工設四與最後一哩合開

name.zh: 創新講座-創意與創新思維(二)

description.zh: 本課程經由邀請產官學界專家蒞校進行講座課程演講及論壇之方式，進行創意與創新思維之實例教學，使學生能儘早瞭解企業創新之模式及相關理論，以啟發學生之創意，促進學術與產業之互動與交流，縮短產學距離。
description.en: This course conducts the instances teaching of creativity and innovate thinking by invite industry, government and academic experts to give lectures and forums. The mine objective is to enable students to understand about the innovation model and related theories of enterprises as soon as possible, and to inspire students’ creativity. Furthermore, promote interaction between academic and industry; and to shorten the distance between academic and industry.

notes: 工設四與最後一哩；3/1.3/15-4/19，上6週，四ABC節

name.zh: 投資決策方法與交易技巧

description.zh:
本堂課邀請大富資訊各領域投資達人，從總經訊息剖析、產業趨勢分析、財務及商業分析投資選股、期權衍生性商品投資策略及套利避險實戰技巧，為台北科技大學學生分享其業界多年的寶貴心得。
財富自由是每個人所企求的，如何於在學期間培養好的投資理財觀念及交易技巧，一方面可降低未來步入職涯後財富大幅縮水的風險，另一方面或許可成為步入職場的利器，甚至可能是邁向財富自由的另一助力。
description.en:
This class is going to invite investment experts from FORTEK COMPUTER CO  to teach the students by sharing their practical experience in the finance industry. The contents include macroeconomic information analysis, industry trend analysis, financial statements analysis, investment strategies of futures and warrants, as well as experience sharing of trading techniques. 
Everybody wants to achieve financial independence; therefore it is important to have the right concept of investments and trading techniques. The purpose of this course is, on the one hand, help students reduce the risk of financial loss due to lack of financial knowledge. On the other hand, for those students who are interested in financial industry, this course offers practical training and may help students to find good financial-related jobs in the future. Also, it may help students to achieve the goal of financial independence.

notes: 經管三、經管所與最後一哩合開

name.zh: 國際貿易實務與關務解析(二)
name.en: Application of international trade and customs declaration resolution II

description.zh:
目的：協助同學通過我國「關務特考」、「報關專責人員特考」、「國際貿易大會考認證考試」等國家考試中「國際貿易」之相關考科。
內容：解析國內國家考試「關務實務」之命題趨勢。並以實際國際貿易中實務操作為案例，在解題過程中引導學生建立完整的會計理論體系，增進學生對會計理論的理解與應用能力，培養學生的邏輯思考、並增進解題技巧，順利通過國家考試。
description.en:
Purpose: To assist students to pass the relevant examinations of "International Trade", such as " National Special Examination for Customs Specialized personnel", " National Special Examination for Customs Officers", "International Trade Examination for IEAT" and other national examinations.
Content: By introducing the practical applications to the students, which guiding students to get a full understanding of International Trade Practice System while solving the problems by using real cases. It reinforces students’ knowledge and understanding on the International Trade, and helps students to think logically and also increases their problem-solving skills that help students to pass the national examinations successfully.

notes: 經管三、經管所與最後一哩合開

name.zh: 國際觀培養:日語與文化(一)

description.zh: 本課程提供學生養成基本日語聽說讀寫技能，並能夠面對在各種情境下，表達出適當的日語，足以應付日常生活簡單狀況。此外，並運用多媒體等工具，介紹日本文化，歷史，人文等多種面向，讓學生能更多元地了解日本，有效提升學習興趣及效率。
description.en: This course provides a comprehensive approach to developing the four basic language skills (listening, speaking, reading, and writing) in order to cultivate your overall Japanese language ability to a level sufficient for various occasions and everyday life.In addition , using multimedia to introduce a variety of Japanese culture, history , and humanities. The students can learn more about Japan in many different perspectives, and effectively enhance interest in the learning process.

notes: A班/建議「無」日文基礎者修讀

name.zh: 國際觀培養:基礎西班牙語1(A1上)

description.zh: 本課程專為初學西班牙文之學生設計，毋需任何西班牙文基礎。本課程著重在學習西班牙文發音及了解基礎文法架構。課程結束前，學生將可以閱讀基本的西班牙文文句、自我介紹及西班牙文的基礎對話。
description.en: This is course is designed for first time students of Spanish. No previous knowledge is required to enroll this course. The focus of this course is to provide a basic knowledge of the pronunciation and grammatical structures of Spanish at the beginner level. By the end of this course, the student will be able to read basic texts in Spanish, self-introduce himself and start a basic conversation.

name.zh: 國際觀培養:基礎西班牙語2(A1下)

description.zh: 本課程專為初學西班牙文之學生設計，毋需任何西班牙文基礎。本課程著重在學習西班牙文發音及了解基礎文法架構。課程結束前，學生將可以閱讀基本的西班牙文文句、自我介紹及西班牙文的基礎對話。
description.en: This is course is designed for first time students of Spanish. No previous knowledge is required to enroll this course. The focus of this course is to provide a basic knowledge of the pronunciation and grammatical structures of Spanish at the beginner level. By the end of this course, the student will be able to read basic texts in Spanish, self-introduce himself and start a basic conversation.

notes: 優先開放修畢基礎西班牙語1

name.zh: 國際觀培養:日語與文化(二)
name.en: Development of global perspective: Japanese Ⅱ

description.zh: 本課程為日語與文化(一)之進階課程，提供學生養成進階日語聽說讀寫技能，並能夠面對在各種情境下，表達出適當的日語，足以應付日常生活簡單狀況。此外，並運用多媒體等工具，介紹日本文化，歷史，人文等多種面向，讓學生能更多元地了解日本，有效提升學習興趣及效率。
description.en: This course is designed for students who has basic Japanese knowledge or who passed the language course: Japanese (I) in the previous term. This course provides a comprehensive approach to developing the four basic language skills (listening, speaking, reading, and writing) in order to cultivate your overall Japanese language ability to a level sufficient for various occasions and everyday life. In addition, using multimedia to introduce a variety of Japanese culture, history , and humanities. The students can learn more about Japan in many different perspectives, and effectively enhance interest in the learning process.

notes: 開放修畢日語(一)或有基礎者

name.zh: 國際觀培養:躍進新南向
name.en: Feast for the global perspective - Engaging Southeast Asia

description.zh: 本課程邀請校外之社會、政治、經濟、文化等專家學者與莘莘學子們相互交流，以「跨文化新視野」、「新南向政策議題」、「東南亞與臺灣之關係」等主題進階探討，培養學生世界公民之意識，提升學生跨文化溝通能力、適應全球化生活與國際競爭力。
description.en: Domestic speakers and outstanding scholars are invited to deliver cross-cultural lectures, sharing their knowledge and experiences with the students. Based on the New Southbound Policy, the themes of the lectures will be focusing on the Southeast Asian countries in terms of social, cultural, political and economic studies. Students are expected to be inspired to strengthen their independent thinking and global perspective and engage with issues regarding Southeast Asia.

description.zh: 期使學生瞭解地震工程學涵蓋之領域，並簡介地球物理學、地質學、地震學、振動學、材力、土壤力學、結構動力學、施工技術以及彈性波動學各領域之基本知識，讓學生領悟如何將各學門知識領域應用於地震工程之設計與施工。
description.en: Use of soil mechanics principles in the analysis,design,and construction of structures.Principles of compaction and compaction control;an introduction to slope stability analysis and landslides;earth reinforcement systems,and ground impovement techniques.

name.zh: 國際觀培養:越南文化與語言II
name.en: Development of global perspective: Vietnam culture and language II

description.zh: 在全球金融海嘯後，已開發國家經濟成長趨緩，新興亞洲國家-東協國家經濟成長迅速，本課程將以越南語教學為主，越南經貿、觀光文化及越語字母拼音教學，讓學生在學習越語的同時，深入了解越南文化，協助學生拓展東南亞的就業版圖。
description.en: This series of courses aim to provide students with opportunities to understand emerging markets in a global context. Global economy in the post-recession world relies heavily on emerging economies, in particular countries in Southeast Asia known as ASEAN. Seeing the greater potential for economic gains and development, we build up the courses from introducing the fundamentals, including but not limited to, their economy, culture, tourism and people with special emphasis on the use of the language for communication along with its relevance to Taiwan as a trading partner.

name.en: Entrepreneurship Practices: The Apprentice in NTUT

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在教授學生創新創業的實務，讓學生實際組成團隊進行創業，並有老師全程指導實踐創業，學校並提供基本創業基金與創業場地，輔導學生實際體會創業的過程。課程內容包括：創新創業精神、創新思考、自我了解、團隊組成、經營模式建立、創業財務、創業專題進行、創業競賽等。
description.en: This course is to instruct students to practice the entrepreneurship and innovation. Students will form an entrepreneurship team. Teacher will guide the students throughout the entrepreneurship processes. University will offer students initial funds and incubation assistances. Students will gain practical experiences on how to establish entrepreneurship. The contents include entrepreneurial thoughts and actions, design thinking, self-understanding, team formation, business model development, entrepreneurship finance, entrepreneurship practices, entrepreneurship contests, and so on.

notes: 經管系所、資財系所與最後一哩合開/需通過審核方能選

name.zh: 室內設計及施工實戰分析(一)
name.en: Interior Design and Construction actual analysis(一)

description.zh:
室內設計是對建築內部環境的再創造，以美觀和實用為原則。
不論是住宅或商業空間，其涵蓋的知識領域包含空間動線、平面配置、色彩計畫、材料挑選、照明分佈，還有機電、空調、法規分析…等應用多元、變化豐富的一門學問。
本課程從概念分析到實務案例分析，使學生儘早了解室內設計實務及相關理論，為進入職場預先做準備。
description.en: Interior design is to recreate the interior environment of the building, with the principle of aesthetics and practicality. Whether it is a residential or commercial space, it covers the areas of knowledge including space dynamic line, plane configuration, color planning, material selection, lighting distribution, as well as electromechanical, air-conditioning, regulatory analysis ... and other applications of diversity, a rich variety of knowledge. This course from the concept analysis to the practical case analysis, enables the student to understand the interior design practice and the related theory as soon as possible, prepares in advance for enters the workplace.

notes: 工設系,創新所與最後一哩合開(3/21,5/16在共科演講廳)

description.zh: 倫理學(Ethics)是討論「應不應該」的一門哲學分支。倫理學可分為「微觀倫理學」：探討個人性之行為的應不應該的問題，以及「宏觀的倫理學」：探討整個社會的政治、經濟、法律、社會等方面的問題。倫理學亦可區分為「規範倫理學」及「應用倫理學」兩大類，前者探討善的定義與判斷準則、動機論與結果論、人的意志是否自由、決定論與責任、自律與他律、幸福與快樂、哪些德行(virtue)值得追求等等課題，後者則是運用倫理學觀點探討諸如安樂死、墮胎、環保、複製人等種種課題。本課程主要目的是在對倫理學課題與種類作一個基本的介紹，訓練及培養學生在倫理問題上思考的能力，期能讓學生在作道德問題的判斷與抉擇上能夠有所進步。
description.en: This course will introduce basic ideas of Ethics to students. The topics will include: the definition and criterion of good, motivation and consequence, the problem of free will, determinism and responsibility, autonomy and discipline by others, happiness and pleasure, and virtues. This course will also touch upon those issues in applied Ethics, such as abortion, environment, business ethics, death sentence, etc.

description.zh:
先修課程：3001051或負責教授同意。
本課程係以商用繪圖CAD軟體（如 TCAD 或 ACAD等）為教學範本、內容包括二維製圖、三維製圖、修訂功能表、命令腳本（Script）以及圖組(Block)、圖形功能表等之製作，以輔助機械製圖為主要目標。
description.en: Use commercial CAD softwares (e.g.: Turbo CAD or Auto CAD) as the tutorial examples for Mechanical Drawings, including 2-D and 3-D drawings, to edit and modify the Menu, Script and Block etc..

description.zh:
先修課程：3001051或負責教授同意。
本課程係以商用繪圖CAD軟體（如 TCAD 或 ACAD等）為教學範本、內容包括二維製圖、三維製圖、修訂功能表、命令腳本（Script）以及圖組(Block)、圖形功能表等之製作，以輔助機械製圖為主要目標。
description.en: Use commercial CAD softwares (e.g.: Turbo CAD or Auto CAD) as the tutorial examples for Mechanical Drawings, including 2-D and 3-D drawings, to edit and modify the Menu, Script and Block etc..

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為讓學生可以利用暑期或其它時間至學校認可之校外公私立機構進行或參與實習，以增進學生之實務能力。學生於學校認可之校外機構實習總累計時數不得低於320小時。學生實習期滿後，應依據各系規定繳交相關實習相關成果報告，彙交所屬系保存，並作為成績核定之依據。學生校外實習學期成績之評定比例原則：實習單位占50%，輔導老師占50%，各系得依其屬性調整之。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to elevate an all-round ability for the students at NTUT. During the summer break　or other periods of time, students are required to go to government-based organizations or industry/business-oriented agencies with respect to promoting practice of ability. The course takers will need to stay in the same individual organization or agency with an accumulated amount of time of no less than 320 hours. After the students complete the requirements in question, these organizations and agencies will offer them certificates -- or proof of any kind -- in accordance with the real performance on site. The grading principle will be equivalently decided by the thesis advisor (50%) and the on-site organization or agency (50%), respectively. The individual department or graduate institute may make proper adjustments according to the situations in need.

notes: (一)34四教204，建築一創意一合開(限主修建築系選課)

name.zh: 人體生物學及生物物理學
name.en: Biology and Biophysics of Human Body

description.zh:
在過去的60年裡，生物醫學工程學科發展已成為明確的，多樣化的，內容無所不包的領域；包括生物電現象、生物信息學、生物材料、生物力學、生物儀器、生物傳感器、生物信號處理等領域，以及生物技術、計算生物學和複雜多樣性、基因組學、醫學影像學、光學和雷射激光、輻射影像、組織工程等。
本課程主要將適用於工程學門學生，且已完成物理、化學或生物學基礎課程為佳。此基礎在大二或大三的學生應該已可做好充分的準備。本課程將學習人體解剖學、生理學、生物物理學和生物醫學工程。整合了一系列知識，以幫助修課同學瞭解生物訊息和醫學儀器，並可以用來監測這些生物醫學現象。課程的學習主要是將這些生物醫學現象，運用其基礎於電力、壓力和流量的物理現象加以說明，並將這些生物醫學現象經由電子及工程的特殊條件和應用系統而呈現。在這種學習中，課程涵蓋了相關醫學和生物學領域、化學、物理、工程的知識和方法，期使將其成功及適當應用於多種生物醫學儀器。本課程將主要研習人體結構（解剖）及其功能系統（生理學），但這些原則同樣也可能適用於其它所有生命系統。
經由醫學背景引導進入此領域，結合工程及材料師長的經驗及參與，將可含括主要生醫工程及組織工程領域的基礎
description.en: Over the past sixty years, as the discipline of biomedical engineering has evolved, it has become clear that it is a diverse, seemingly all-encompassing field that includes such areas as bioelectric phenomena, bioinformatics, biomaterials, biomechanics, bioinstrumentation, biosensors, biosignal processing, biotechnology, computational biology and complexity, genomics, medical imaging, optics and lasers, radiation imaging, tissue engineering, moral and ethical issues. This course will be designed primarily for engineering students who have completed physical equations and a basic course in statics of chemistry and biology.  Students in their sophomore year or junior year should be adequately prepared for this course.  This course will be learning about human anatomy, biophysics, physiology, and biomedical engineering. It brings together a number of disciplines to help understand biomedical phenomena and the instrumentation that can be used to monitor these phenomena. It is primarily abo

notes: 電子大三大四與電子所合開

description.zh: 本課程中包含下列主題：1.簡介；2.電子商店的行銷策略；3.電子商店的建   置；4. 電子商店的經營與管理；5. 電子商店的法律問題；6.案例介紹；7.結論。
description.en: In the course, the following topics will be discussed：1.Overview of EC；2.The marketing strategies of EC；3.How to install an EC；4.The management of EC；5.The current problems of EC；6.Cases study；7.Conclusion。

notes: 工管大三合開；計網電腦教室

description.zh: 本課程介紹資金管理的理論與實務應用。如何判斷一個交易系統好壞，使其不斷產生利潤? 我們將從理論出發，套用在實務交易模擬上，包含單一策略、多商品、多市場、多策略的運用。本課程將以R語言搭配模擬。
description.en: This course introduces the theory and practice of money management. How to determine a trading system is good or bad, how to continues to generate profits in a trading system? We will start from the theory, applied to the simulation of real trading market, including single strategy, multi-commodities, multi-markets, multi-strategies. This course will be run with R language.

description.zh: 本課程銜接上學期程式交易課程內容(限定修過上學期的同學才能選修)，我們將使用R語言進行更為精實的交易策略建構，包刮K棒分析、指標建構、訊號探勘、資金管理…等。此外，我們下半學期將邀請業師教授XQ程式交易軟體，撰寫XS程式語法進行回測以及模擬下單
description.en: This course connects with the last semester courses “program trading” (limited to last semester students to join). We will use the R language for more sophisticated trading strategy construction, including K-bar analysis, index construction, trading signal exploration, money management, and so on. In addition, we will invite the instructor to teach XQ program trading software in the last half-semester, usingXS program grammar to back-testing trading strategies.

notes: 資財三四與資財所合開

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在教授學生金融科技的基本概念，以及創新創新創業的思維與方法，使學生具備金融科技方面的創新創業能力。課程內容包括：金融科技概論、創業思維、設計思考、商業模式、金融科技商業模式、人工智慧、金融大數據、虛擬貨幣、區塊鏈、P2P借貸、第三方交易、群眾募資、P2P匯兌、程式交易、機器人理財等。
description.en: This course is to instruct students the basic concepts of financial technology, entrepreneurial thoughts, and design thinking to enable students to develop innovative applications of financial technology. The contents include introduction to financial technology, entrepreneurial thoughts, design thinking, business models, financial technology business models, artificial intelligence, financial big data, virtual money, blockchain, P2P lending, third-party payment, crowd funding, P2P remittance, program trading, and robotic financial advisory.

notes: 資財三四與資財所合開/科研243

description.zh: 本課程由ERP概論談起，介紹完整的ERP架構及涵蓋的模組，以及企業規劃及導入ERP的過程，最後結合案例介紹、並探討從ERP到企業的e化等主題，期許同學完成本課程後能了解並運用ERP。
description.en: This course begins with a brief introduction of ERP, followed by a comprehensive discussion on the system architecture, functions, and modules of ERP. Also covered in the course is the process of planning and introducing ERP in enterprises. Real-world cases of ERP and e-Business will be provided in the course.

notes: 資財四與資財所合開/科研243

description.zh: 本課程介紹進階的Java程式語言技能。包括：物件導向、圖形介面、網路、多媒體及網頁等設計技能。
description.en: This course introduces advanced programming skills of Java language. They include object-oriented, GUI, networking, multimedia, web development, and so on.

description.zh: 介紹程式語言基本資料處理的概念，包含基本輸入與輸出、程式的流程控制、函數的應用等指令的撰寫、程式的編輯、編譯、聯絡與程式的執行，並發展一套應用程式。
description.en: This course introduces the basic data processes of C++ language, including input/output, program process control, application of functions, program editing and execution, and so on.

notes: 資財三四合開/師資待聘/科研240

name.zh: 個性化產品設計與開發實作
name.en: Design and Development of Customization Products

description.zh: 本課程應用系統性創新/TRIZ 萃思發明問題的解決理論/設計思考/QFD 四 階段品質機能展開，透過跨領域團隊合作，結合新科技趨勢、數位經濟、 平台經濟與共享經濟，與 C2M 消費者直通製造廠商業模式，進行眾設模式 個性化產品開發設計之實作。
description.en: The objectives of the course are to learn how to apply Systematic Innovation/TRIZ (Theory of Inventive Problem Solving)/Design Thinking/QFD, the four stages of quality function deployment into integrating new trends of technology, digital economic, platform economic and sharing economic with Customer-to-Manufacturer (C2M), business model, to advance the practice of crowd design platform and to personalize products design development through interdisciplinary team-working as well as collaborating.

notes: 工設三四合開(跨領域專題)

description.zh: 運動、營養與健康是目前先進國家相當關注之理念與課題，也是提升生活品質與開發個人潛能的有效方法。本課程將有系統的介紹健康的生活方式與規律適度的運動，並將著重於如何將運動學與營養學之學理與技術，適當應用於個體健康生活整體之營造，使修課學生能了解運動前後的均衡飲食與擁有健康。
description.en: Exercise, nutrition and health is very concerned about the idea of advanced countries and issues, but also an effective way to develop individual potential and quality of life improved. This course will introduce a healthy lifestyle with moderate exercise system of law, and will focus on how the theoretical and technical kinematics and nutrition, the proper individuals applied to create a healthy life as a whole, so that students can enjoy the sport taught , and have a healthy balanced diet.

name.zh: 創業之品牌管理與行銷
name.en: The Brand Management and Marketing of Entrepreneurship

description.zh: 創業者在新創事業時，同時須考慮新創事業之品牌建構，如果能在創業之初建構一個定位明確的品牌，可使新創事業立即享有良好的品牌權益，提高創業成功的機會。品牌建構完成後，須設計行銷方案，對消費者進行行銷活動，向消費者推銷新創公司之品牌，以塑造良好的品牌權益。此時，消費者對新創公司之品牌會有良好形象之認知，進而提升顧客對新創公司品牌忠誠度，增加創業者創業成功之機會。
description.en:
When entrepreneurs are building a startup company, they also need to consider its brand building. If they can construct a clear positioning of the brand in the beginning, they are able to have their new business with a better brand equity immediately, and improve entrepreneurial chances of success.
After the completion of construction of the brand, entrepreneurs need to design marketing programs for consumer marketing activities, and promote its brand to create good brand equity. In the meantime, consumers will have a better brand awareness of these new companies, enhancing customer loyalty and increasing opportunities for entrepreneurs’ entrepreneurial success.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生成為具有深度文化視覺的科技人。從認識本土文化為起點，進而認識世界文化。引導學生如何探究文化現象，並且深入文化的精神境界，物質境界，瞭解文化價值與文化傳統，讓文化觀點充分融入個人的思維內涵。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to develop the cultural cultivation of our technology majored students. Starting with the culture of our own land and extending to world-wide culture. The teachers would guide the students to explore the phenomena of the culture, and try to find out both the spirit and the material of the culture. Through the understanding of the worth and the tradition of the culture, the students might merge the cultural cultivation into their personal thinking.

description.zh: 新經濟與舊經濟的分野不是在有『e』還是沒有『e』，而是在有『i』還是沒有『i』，而『i』就是『Innovation，創新』。二十一世紀的『腦力經濟』最重要的戲規則就是『智慧財產權』，同時也是WTO會員國必須遵守的重要規範之一。課程內容主要包括三個最基本的智慧財產權課題：專利權，商標權，以及著作權；而為配合本校學生學科背景，本課程將較著重於『專利』方面的實務知識，並且講授『如何激發創意，以培養學生日後能好好應用『智慧財產權』的保護。
description.en: The difference between New-economy and Old-economy is not caused by having "e" or not having "e", but caused by owining "i" or not owning "i". where "I" means "Innovation:.  Intellectual Property is not only the most importance business rule of the :Brain economy era:, but also one of the most important agreements among WTO members.  This course includes the basic three subjects of Intellectual Property:Patent, Trademark, and Copyright.  In order to accommodate the learning background for most of NTUT students, the contents of this course will focus more on the practical practice of the Patennt.  In addition, it also includes the subject of "how to activate your creativeness:so as to make students can use what they learn, "Intellectual Property:, to protect their intellectual work.

description.zh:
透過分析創新成功之實際個案，讓修課同學了解創新的本質。課程中將介紹不同類型的創新個案，包括：技術創新、產品創新、服務創新與管理創新。本課程也擬搭配邀請成功之創業顧問與談，提供實務經驗，分享創業者該有的認知以及創業的重要理念，當然也包括分享他們在邀創業過程中所面臨的各類挑戰。
創業是每個人都曾經懷抱過的夢想，透過創新成功之個案的分析，可以了解到個案公司是如何有步驟的循序漸進。針對每個個案，我們要求每位同學於課前完成個案的閱讀，並於上課前交出本次課程的課前預習心得。我們希望每位參與的同學都能在討論時充分表達意見，遇有不清楚或不同意見時能夠勇於提出他們的看法。本課程擬營造出一種研究的環境，讓學生可以針對個案盡其所能清楚的提出建議並來說服同儕。
description.en:
The course enable participant to realize the essential features of innovation via cases study. Various types of innovation cases are included, such as: technology innovation, service innovation and management innovation. We also plan to invites some successful constants to give participants talk and share their experiences, including the challenge and their resolving process.
The real case study enables participants to understand the entrepreneurship and the steps to start a business. The participants are required to complete the case reading and a preview report is required in advance the class. We hope that every participant can propose their opinion and persuade others colleges of their viewpoints.

name.zh: 國際觀培養:日語與文化(一)

description.zh: 本課程提供學生養成基本日語聽說讀寫技能，並能夠面對在各種情境下，表達出適當的日語，足以應付日常生活簡單狀況。此外，並運用多媒體等工具，介紹日本文化，歷史，人文等多種面向，讓學生能更多元地了解日本，有效提升學習興趣及效率。
description.en: This course provides a comprehensive approach to developing the four basic language skills (listening, speaking, reading, and writing) in order to cultivate your overall Japanese language ability to a level sufficient for various occasions and everyday life.In addition , using multimedia to introduce a variety of Japanese culture, history , and humanities. The students can learn more about Japan in many different perspectives, and effectively enhance interest in the learning process.

notes: B班/建議「無」日文基礎者修讀

name.zh: 國際觀培養：泰國文化概論
name.en: Development of global perspective: Introduction to Thai Culture

description.zh: 課程以跨文化理解為宗旨，課程架構包括泰國歷史背景的概述與文化議題的討論，使學生對泰國政治、經濟、社會、地理、歷史各方面的情勢以及語言、思想、禮節、風俗習慣、宗教禁忌等各個層面的泰國文化，都具有深度認識，呈現出不同於一般刻板印象中的泰國，培養學生對泰國的正確理解與尊重態度。
description.en: This course aims to introduce students with cross-culture understanding through establishing basic knowledge of history, components of society, politics and other diverse aspects of Thailand. By the end of the course, students will be able to hold natural and respectful attitude toward Thai culture.

name.en: Development of global perspective: Korean I

description.zh: 本課程將教導學生韓文字母結構、發音方法及基礎詞彙、文法與句型、韓國現況及文化等，透過文化與語言的習得，培養學生與韓籍人士溝通或在韓國生活所需要的最基本的溝通能力。
description.en: This course aims to introduce beginners to basic spoken and written skills in Korean. Students will develop basic skills with a focus on effective communication and enjoyment through listening, speaking, reading and writing. By the end of the course, students will be able to hold a simple conversation in Korean, comprehend basic Korean texts and write about their everyday lives.

name.zh: 國際觀培養：馬來文化與實用會話
name.en: Development of global perspective: Malay Culture and Practical Conversation

description.zh: 本課程共分三個單元，各三個主題，希望透過這些主題，讓學生有系統地學習馬來西亞語言和文化，課程結束之後，能夠掌握馬來西亞當代的社會發展脈絡，以及基本生活語言。
description.en: This course will be divided into three units, containing three topics of each. Students will be introduced Malay culture and language through these topics systematically. At the end of this course, students will be able to keep up with the development in Malaysia, and use Malay as a daily language.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹程式設計的基礎，透過腳本式語言及基礎程式語言的應用，培養學生程式設計的基本能力。本課程除加強技術開發能力外，也將導引學生，如何透過獨立思考來面對問題及分析問題，並透過程式的撰寫來解決問題。
description.en: This course will introduce the fundamental of computer programming design. Student will learn the capability of programming design using script language and basic programming language. This course will also provide the knowledge and methods for students to realize and analyze specific problem independently. So that they can using computer program to solve the problems.

description.zh: 1.積體電路的分類，2.積體電路晶片設計的流程，3.CMOS元件的基本結構與佈局，4.CMOS元件的設計規範技術，5.CMOS元件組成各種數位電路，6.以高階方法探討積體電路之設計，7.系統分割，8.設計問題之探討，9.IC的構造， 10.設計方法，11.時序問題之探討，12.鐘脈問題之探討，13.VLSI之測試，14.有助於設計與測試的結構化技巧探討，15.專題製作。
description.en:
1.Classification of VLSI circuit 
2.Flow of VLSI design 
3.VLSI characterization 
4.CMOS design methods
5.CMOS digital circuit 
6.High-level VLSI design
7.System partiton 
8.Time squence
9.Clock
10.VLSI testing 
11.Special projects

description.zh: 基礎生物化學，是從認識動、植物和細菌細胞到脂質、蛋白質和DNA和醣類構造及其功能關係。
description.en: This course introduces animal, plant and bacterial cells and the basic structural of protein, DNA, RNA, lipid and carbohydrate.

description.zh:
先修課程：3001051或負責教授同意。
本課程係以商用繪圖CAD軟體（如 TCAD 或 ACAD等）為教學範本、內容包括二維製圖、三維製圖、修訂功能表、命令腳本（Script）以及圖組(Block)、圖形功能表等之製作，以輔助機械製圖為主要目標。
description.en: Use commercial CAD softwares (e.g.: Turbo CAD or Auto CAD) as the tutorial examples for Mechanical Drawings, including 2-D and 3-D drawings, to edit and modify the Menu, Script and Block etc..

description.zh: 本課程目標在教授學生生醫材料與醫療器材技術商品化之實務知識。首先介紹生醫材料產品之特性與市場概況，並由各國醫療法規為出發點，教導學生了解生醫材料產品上市所需之相關程序。特別透過實例之講解，引導學生了解設計、製造、測試三大重點之實務操作。包括產品設計之準則，ISO 13485醫療器材品質系統實務操作，臨床前生物相容測試以及臨床試驗之執行等。課程設計將著重實際法規之講解、實力講解與分析以工廠參觀。將由本校專任教師配合企業講師任教，培育學生迅速進入相關產業工作之能力。
description.en: The objective of this course it to illustrate the commercialization process for biomaterials products. The features and the marketing overview of biomaterials will be introduced first. The regulatory issues and the necessary procedures for the commercialization process will be introduced. By the case studies, it is designed to train the students about the necessary concepts of product design, manufacturing and testing processes. It consists of the product design guidelines, ISO 13485 medical products GMP, pre-clinical and clinical tests.

notes: 化工大四與化工所合開

description.zh: 先修課程：3002014或負責教授同意。一維及多維穩定態熱傳導及非穩定態熱傳導、對流原理、強迫對流及自然對流經驗和實驗關係式、輻射熱傳遞、凝結與沸騰、熱交換器、熱傳遞中的特殊論題。
description.en: Steady-State Conduction-One Dimension, Steady-State Conduction-Multiple Dimensions, Unsteady-State Conduction, Principles of Convection, Empirical and Practical Relations for Forced-Convection Heat Transfer, Natural- Convection Systems, Radiation Heat Transfer, Condensation and Boiling Heat Transfer, Heat Exchangers, Special Topics in Heat Transfer.

notes: 機械大三合開/許書涵教師

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

notes: 北醫大/博雅選修文史/教師賴淑芳/3101教室

name.zh: 大腦裡的偵探：知覺、感覺與錯覺
name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

notes: 北醫大/博雅選修自然/教師曾祥非/3201教室

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：History

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生對歷史這門學科有一通盤、系統的認識，以便讓學生瞭解歷史的思維取向，增加個人的歷史意識。並在歷史學門的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文明的進程與發展，剖析歷史學與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

notes: 北大/博雅選修文史/教師陳淑惠/資1F08教室

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生對歷史這門學科有一通盤、系統的認識，以便讓學生瞭解歷史的思維取向，增加個人的歷史意識。並在歷史學門的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文明的進程與發展，剖析歷史學與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

notes: 北大/博雅選修社哲/教師張朝琴/社205教室

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Nomocracy

description.zh: 本課程以民主、法治課程為核心，重在強化公民的素養，增進政治體制及法律運作實務等之相關課程。
description.en: Democracy and nomocracy are the core curriculum, focusing on enhancing the quality of citizens and promoting the related courses in  the political system, the operation of the law practices and so on.
