description.zh: 本課程為財務會計領域之進階課程，針對已具初級會計學之學生深入講授財務會計之理論、觀念、方法及程序。本課程全面納入國際財務報導準則(IFRS)，內容包括：介紹財務報導觀念架構、主要財務報表編製、講解資產負債表中有關資產、負債、股東權益以及現金流量表與租賃會計等，修習本課程可使學生對IFRS有全面整體了解及運用之能力。亦有助於將來參加會計乙級、記帳士及公務人員高考等證照考試。
description.en: This course is an advanced course for financial accounting. It is to teach the financial accounting theory, concept, method and procedure for students with some basic accounting knowledge. The course covers all the materials to understand financial accounting based on IFRS. The course will help students for preparing advanced license examinations for accounting.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為訓練有志於教學服務的學生，提供參與教學協助之服務實習環境，學習運用自身系所專業知能與訓練溝通表達解說能力，輔助教師教學進行，體驗學習到熟稔課程基本理論、課程教材教具準備及歸位、課堂協助教學活動或演示操作教具、帶領討論、課後協助進行課業輔導、解說試題、學習如何批改作業報告、協助監督測驗等實際行動，透過教學相長過程，增加協助教學實務經驗。
description.en: This course is designed for students who are interested in teaching. It provides opportunities to the students to put their academic training in a practical teaching environment. They will participate in various aspects of teaching, e.g. assisting the teacher in the classroom. They will be allowed opportunities to foster their communication skills and the ability to express and explain themselves in order to facilitate class discussion. They will be able to familiarize themselves with the principal theory of the course, preparation of course materials, teaching aids, demonstration of the teaching aids and materials and leading the class discussion. They will also participate in the after class assistance, e.g. academic counseling, reviewing and explaining questions with the students. They will also learn how to mark or grade reports, have the practical experience in supervising tests. The overall goal is to increase and enhance student’s teaching ability through the practical teaching

name.en: Introduction to network and information security

description.zh: 本課旨在研討網路與資訊安全概念與技術，內容包括：網路與資訊安全簡介、資訊中心管理與實體安全、使用者身份識別、作業系統安全、秘密、公開金鑰密碼系統、文件訊息驗證、網路通訊協定(TCP/IP)安全、電子商務安全、資料庫安全及系統安全等。
description.en: This course provides an introduction and practical survey of network and information security. This course including network and information security basic introduce, information management and entity security, identification mechanism, public-key encryption, digital signatures and authentication protocols, internet protocol (TCP / IP) security, e-commerce security database security, and system security.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為讓學生於學期間至學校認可之校外公私立機構進行或參與實習，以增進學生之實務能力。學生於學校認可之校外機構實習總累計時數不得低於720小時。學生實習期滿後，應依據各系規定繳交相關實習相關成果報告，彙交所屬系保存，並作為成績核定之依據。學生校外實習學期成績之評定比例原則：實習單位占50%，輔導老師占50%，各系得依其屬性調整之。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to elevate an all-round ability for the students at Taipei Tech. During the semester, students are required to go to government-based organizations or industry/business-oriented agencies. The course takers will need to stay in the same individual organization or agency with an accumulated amount of time of no less than720 hours. After the students complete the requirements in question, these organizations and agencies will offer them certificates -- or proof of any kind -- in accordance with the real performance on site. The grading principle will be equivalently decided by the thesis advisor (50%) and the on-site organization or agency (50%), respectively. The individual department or graduate institute may make proper adjustments according to the situations as needed.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用學期間至相關機構實習（實習實際天數依「校外實習」實行辦法另訂之），參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業企業之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，彙交系上保存。
description.en: The course is developed to increase students' capability of on-job practice. Participation in one of the corporative company during curriculum session, practice and learn the real operation of the ing related fields . A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用整學期至機械相關機構實習，參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告。須在同一機構連續實習4.5月，學生應全職於實習機構實習。
description.en: The course is developed to increase on-job practice capability of students. Participants practice and learn the real operation of the mechanical engineering related fields in one of the corporative electronic engineering company during one semester. A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement. It is necessary to practice in one corporative mechanical engineering company full-time at least 4.5 months.

description.zh:
課程綱要：
1.高分子結構及其物理性質
2.高分子定性與分析
3.高分子流變學
4.高分子複合材料
description.en:
Course Outline：
1.Polymeric Structure and its Properties
2.Characterization and Analysis of  Polymers
3.Rheology of Polymers
4.Polymeric Composite Materials

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用整學期至土木工程相關機構實習，參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業機構之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告。須在同一機構連續實習4.5月，學生應全職於實習機構實習。
description.en: The course is developed to increase on-job practice capability of students. Participants practice and learn the real operation of the civil engineering related fields in one of the corporative civil engineering company during one semester. A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement. It is necessary to practice in one corporative civil engineering company full-time at least 4.5 months

description.zh: 本課程為「學期校外實習」之延續性課程，須先修習過學期校外實習，始能修習本課程。本課程主要培養學生的職場經驗，此經驗包括有職場倫理外，也讓學生意識到學校教育與現實職場間的差異、產業對人才的選擇標準、自我能力基本要求的考驗、和未來可就業的相關企業。進而檢討自我的未來生涯規劃。
description.en: This is the extended course to help students' career developments and to enhance their working experiences prior to their graduation. Students will work at a electric-optic engineering related company or research organization on-site. The duration is one full-time semester. Students would learn the real-life operations of professional technology, acknowledge the differences between the school and working environments, understand the business needs, and develop their professional ethics. Through the program, students would be able to self-evaluate the gaps between their own capabilities and the professional needs, and establish or adjust their career development plans accordingly. A student would require to work full-time on-site the company and submit a full semester paper to fulfill the program requirements.

name.zh: 部份工時學期校外實習

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生須於學期中至光電工程相關機構連續實習18週，每週不得低於2.5天。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核，學生應於校外實習完成後一週內繳交校外實習報告，由實習輔導老師評定實習成績。
description.en: This course is designed to enhance students' on-job practical experiences. Students will work at an electro-optical engineering related company or research organizations for 18 weeks(20 hours per week) during the semester. Through the program, students would learn the hands-on professional technology. Each student would be required to submit a written report right after the end of the internship for grading.

name.zh: 彈性工時學期校外實習

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生須於學期中至光電工程相關機構連續實習18週，工時可彈性安排週間但每週不得低於32小時。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核，學生應於校外實習完成後一週內繳交校外實習報告，由實習輔導老師評定實習成績。
description.en: This course is designed to enhance students' on-job practical experiences. Students will work at an electro-optical engineering related company or research organizations for 18 weeks(flexible working hours and 32 hours at least per week) during the semester. Through the program, students would learn the hands-on professional technology. Each student would be required to submit a written report right after the end of the internship for grading.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。半導體元件、整流電路、電晶體和電路、運算放大器、線性積體電路、邏輯元件、數位電路、數位積體電路、微處理器、放大器等。
description.en: Semiconduction Device, Rectifier circuit, Transistor Circuit, Operational Amplifier, Linear Integrated Circuit, logic Device, Digital Circuit, Digital Integrated Circuit, Micro Processor, Amplifier, etc.

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生在畢業之前即獲得短期體驗光電產業的職場經驗，此經驗包括有職場倫理外，也讓學生意識到學校教育與現實職場間的差異、產業對人才的選擇標準、自我能力基本要求的考驗、和未來可就業的相關企業。進而檢討自我的未來生涯規劃。
description.en: The course is designed to help students' career developments and to enhance their working experiences prior to their graduation. Students will work at a electric-optic engineering related company or research organization on-site. The duration is one full-time semester. Students would learn the real-life operations of professional technology, acknowledge the differences between the school and working environments, understand the business needs, and develop their professional ethics. Through the program, students would be able to self-evaluate the gaps between their own capabilities and the professional needs, and establish or adjust their career development plans accordingly. A student would require to work full-time on-site the company and submit a full semester paper to fulfill the program requirements.

description.zh:
壹、保護創新	
  1. 如何透過專利保護科技創新
  2. 專利的迷思
貳、專利概念與規法	
  1. 我國專利體系介紹 
  2. 專利相關法規之介紹
  3. 專利取得的流程
參、發明專利實體審查基	
  1. 專利說明書及圖示的撰寫格式 
  2. 何謂發明單一性 
  3. 優先權的使用
  4. 說明書之補充、修正、更正
  5. 專利權期間之延長
肆、專利說明書搜尋及閱讀	
  1. 各國專利的搜尋引擎
  2. 專利工具的使用
  3. 閱讀專利說明書
伍、專利說明書的撰寫與申請	
  1. 專利說明書撰寫之重要
  2. 專利說明書之格式
  3. 專利說明書之撰寫技巧
陸、專利與創新	
  1. 如何由需求或靈感取得創新
  2. 如何使創新轉化為實質專利
  3. 如何從專利撰寫演化出創新
柒、專利戰略與佈局	
  1. 如何利用專利在商場上作戰
  2. 專利佈局模式
捌、專利舉發實務	
  1. 專利舉發方式
  2. 專利舉發程序
  3. 專利舉發策略運用
  4. 舉發撤銷要件
玖、專利侵害及訴訟實例 	
  1. 從案例中學習專利侵害的攻防與法院訴訟的爭點。
壹拾、		
  1.專家演講(法官，技審官，審查官，律師)	邀請領域的專家分享實務經驗
description.en:
1. Patent Protection
2. Patent Law
3.Patent Search and Reading
4. Patent writing and application
5. Patent and Innovation
6. Patent Examination Procedure
7. Patent Strategy
8. patent invalidation
9. Patent Infringement and Suit
10. Special Topics

notes: 電子大四合開/日職合開

description.zh: 本課程係以提高學生新聞英文閱聽能力為主， 使得學生能廣泛熟悉各類新聞媒介的文章專論. 學生將建立各領域的常用/專用字彙, 了解分析寫作風格與技巧, 並增強聽力能力.  透過日日變化更新的世界時事, 學習英文將是切身相關, 生動活潑的經驗.  除了英語能力提升或知識增長豐富之外, 更可以奠定未來繼續獨立學習的基礎. 教學材料來源取材自China Post, Time, Newsweek, CNN, 民視英語新聞等新聞媒體。
description.en: The aim of this course is to guide students into the world of modern English in a wide range of writing styles and subject matters.  It intends to build up confidence and competence of students who are interested in reading a variety of topics in the newspapers and magazines as well as other media. The first focus is to enrich vocabulary tank by learning key words in realms like business, economic, politics, entertainment, art; the second is to help master the writing skills and styles in journalism; the last is to enhance listening ability via broadcasting materials on audio/video channels like ICRT and CNN.

class.name: 專業職場英文銜接計畫(大三)

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用全學期至相關機構實習（實習實際天數依「校外實習」實行辦法另訂之），參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業企業之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，彙交系上保存。
description.en: The course is developed to increase students' capability of on-job practice. Participation in one of the corporative company during full curriculum session, practice and learn the real operation of the ing related fields . A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用學期至相關機構實習（實習實際天數依「校外實習」實行辦法另訂之），參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，彙交系上保存。
description.en: The course is developed to increase students' capability of on-job practice. Students participate in one of the corporative engineering companies during curriculum session, practice and experience in the materials and mineral resources engineering related fields . A practice intern and a written report must be completed to meet the course requirement.

description.zh: 先修課程：電子學相當課程或負責教授同意。 數位系統簡介，數字系統及編碼，基本邏輯操作，布林代數與卡諾圖，組合邏輯電路設計與應用，多工器與解多工器，正反器，暫存器，順序電路設計與應用，計數器與計時器，記憶體，微處理機架構簡介。
description.en: Introduction to digital circuits, digital systems and coding, basic logic operations, Boolean algebra and Karnaugh-map, combinational logic circuit design and applications, multiplexer and demultiplexer, flip-flop, register, sequential logic circuit design and applications, counter and timer, shift register and memory, introduction to micro-processor.

description.zh: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through reading materials appropriate to their levels; (2) to develop reading skill by giving explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as analysis of basic writing skill; (3)to  familiarize students with useful expressions in conversation and build up their confidence in cross-cultural communication; (4)to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

description.zh: 多元英文系列課程以強化英語文實務及溝通能力為目標，提供不同主題內容及學習任務之課程。本系列課程整合語言技巧之訓練、專業內容主題之教授、及功能性之實務英文應用。課程設計主軸包括任務導向教學、主題式教學、及互動式語言訓練並導入多樣性之語言素材。修習課程前應詳細了解個別課程內容並評估個別英語應用之需求。
description.en: The Diversified English Series aims to develop students’ English communication competence through a variety of English courses. These courses integrate training of language skills, content-driven instruction and pragmatic use of English by tasks. The design of the series of courses incorporates the following syllabi: the collaborative task-based syllabus, content-based syllabus, and interactive skill-based syllabus, encompassing a wide range of topics. Selecting the best possible course is a key decision to guarantee the success of English learning. It is thus recommended that students evaluate their needs and wants and discuss the course options available with their English instructors.

notes: 中國文化大學、淡江大學

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生須於學期中至相關機構連續實習18週，每週不得低於2.5天。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核，學生應於校外實習完成後一週內繳交校外實習報告，由實習輔導老師評定實習成績。
description.en: This course is designed to enhance students' on-job practical experiences. Students will work at an engineering related company or research organizations for 18 weeks (20 hours per week) during the semester. Through the program, students would learn the hands-on professional technology. Each student would be required to submit a written report right after the end of the internship for grading.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，修課學生必須至化學、化工相關機構實習，參與校外合作工廠所提供之實質訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，於次一學期註冊後，再由指導教師依據學生之心得報告，加以檢核、指導撰寫成實習成果報告，彙交系上保存，可供其他同學參考。
description.en: The course is developed to increase students' capability of on-job practice. Participation in one of the corporative chemical or chemical engineering company, practice and learn the real operation in the field of molecular science and engineering. A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用整學期至化學工程與生物科技相關機構實習，參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告。須在同一機構連續實習4.5月，學生應全職於實習機構實習。
description.en: The course is developed to increase on-job practice capability of students. Participants practice and learn the real operation of the chemical engineering and biotechnology related fields in one of the corporative chemical engineering company during one semester. A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement. It is necessary to practice in one corporative chemical engineering company full-time at least 4.5 months.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生須於學期中至資訊相關機構連續實習18週，每週不得低於2.5天。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核，學生應於校外實習完成後一週內繳交校外實習報告，由實習輔導老師評定實習成績。

Students will work at a computer science (information engineering) related company or research organizations for 18 weeks(20 hours per week) during the semester. Through the program, students would learn the hands-on professional technology. Each student would be required to submit a written report right after the end of the internship for grading.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生須於學期中至資訊相關機構連續實習4.5月，學生應全職於實習機構實習。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核，學生應於校外實習完成後一週內繳交校外實習報告，由實習輔導老師評定實習成績。

Through the program, students would learn the hands-on professional technology. Each student would be required to submit a written report right after the end of the internship for grading.

Students would learn the real-life operations of professional technology, acknowledge the differences between the school and working environments, understand the business needs, and develop their professional ethics. Students will work at a vehicle engineering related company or research organization on-site. The duration is one full-time academic year. Students would learn the real-life operations of professional technology, acknowledge the differences between the school and working environments, understand the business needs, and develop their professional ethics. Through the program, students would be able to self-evaluate the gaps between their own capabilities and the professional needs, and establish or adjust their career development plans accordingly. A student would require to work full-time on-site the company and submit a full academic year paper to fulfill the program requirements.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用整學期至電子工程相關機構實習，參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告。須在同一機構連續實習4.5月，學生應全職於實習機構實習。

Participants practice and learn the real operation of the electronic engineering related fields in one of the corporative electronic engineering company during one semester. A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement. It is necessary to practice in one corporative electronic engineering company full-time at least 4.5 months.

description.en: The course is developed to increase students' capability of on-job practice. Participation in one of the corporative company during curriculum session, practice and learn the real operation of the ing related fields . A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用整學期到工業工程與管理相關機構實習，參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告。須在同一機構連續實習4.5月，學生應全職於實習機構實習。

Participants practice and learn the real operation of the industrial engineering and management related fields in one of the corporative industrial engineering company during one semester. A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement. It is necessary to practice in one corporative industrial engineering and management company full-time at least 4.5 months.

description.zh:
為培養大學部學生自主學習能力，由學生主動積極創造並實現自己有興趣之主題。學生於特定主題之創造與實現中，學習到思考批判與問題解決等能力。教師擔任輔助指導角色，引導學生從實踐中學習問題解決能力。
    學生根據自己的興趣與能力訂定自主學習計畫，並於開學前向各系提出申請，由本系專任老師擔任指導教師，審查計畫及評核學期成績。
description.en: This course aims to develop undergraduates’ active learning skills by making students engage in the creation and realization of topics of students’ own interest. In the process of specific topic creation and realization, students will proactively learn critical-thinking and problem-solving skills. Instructors cultivate the active engagement of students in problem solving, without actually participating in it.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為讓學生學期中至學校認可之校外公私立機構進行或參與實習，以增進學生之實務能力。學生於學校認可之校外機構實習至少為期4.5個月。學生實習期滿後，應依據各系規定繳交相關實習相關成果報告，彙交所屬系保存，並作為成績核定之依據。學生校外實習學期成績之評定比例原則：實習單位占50%，輔導老師占50%，各系得依其屬性調整之。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to elevate an all-round ability for the students at NTUT. During the semester, students are required to go to government-based organizations or industry/business-oriented agencies with respect to promoting practice of ability. The course takers will need to stay in the same individual organization or agency with an accumulated amount of time of 4.5 months. After the students complete the requirements in question, these organizations and agencies will offer them certificates -- or proof of any kind -- in accordance with the real performance on site. The grading principle will be equivalently decided by the thesis advisor (50%) and the on-site organization or agency (50%), respectively. The individual department or graduate institute may make proper adjustments according to the situations in need.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用課餘至相關機構實習（實習實際天數依「校外實習」實行辦法另訂之），參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業企業之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，彙交系上保存。
description.en: The course is developed to increase students' capability of on-job practice. Participation in one of the corporative company during summer vocation, practice and learn the real operation of the ing related fields . A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用學期間至相關機構實習（實習實際天數依「校外實習」實行辦法另訂之），參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業企業之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，彙交系上保存。
description.en: The course is developed to increase students' capability of on-job practice. Participation in one of the corporative company during semester period, practice and learn the real operation of the ing related fields . A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用學期至電機相關機構實習（實習實際天數依「校外實習」實行辦法另訂之），參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，彙交系上保存。
description.en: The course is developed to increase students' capability of on-job practice. Participation is carried out in one of the corporative electrical engineering company during curriculum session. The students practice and learn the real operation of the electrical engineering related fields. A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement.

description.zh:
為培養大學部學生自主學習能力，由學生主動積極創造並實現自己有興趣之主題。學生於特定主題之創造與實現中，學習到思考批判與問題解決等能力。教師擔任輔助指導角色，引導學生從實踐中學習問題解決能力。
    學生根據自己的興趣與能力訂定自主學習計畫，並於開學前向各系提出申請，由本系專任老師擔任指導教師，審查計畫及評核學期成績。
description.en:
This course aims to develop undergraduates’ active learning skills by making students engage in the creation and realization of topics of students’ own interest. In the process of specific topic creation and realization, students will proactively learn critical-thinking and problem-solving skills. Instructors cultivate the active engagement of students in problem solving, without actually participating in it. 

In this course, students are required to draw up self-learning plans based on their own interests and capabilities and then submit their plans to the departmental office for approval by the beginning of the semester.

description.zh: 本課程採分組進行，教師就個人專業在「文化事業」相關領域中提出專題教學規劃，由學生選擇組別，參與研習並進行實地演練。每組六人以上，計2-4組，透過分組，以拓展學生學習範疇，因應不同學生不同的興趣與需求。上課時間機動地結合參訪、實作、活動參與等，課程結束後必須以展演、競賽方式發表成果。
description.en: In the course, students will be divided into several groups, and according to teacher's instructional planning which is related to the fields of "culture", students can choose one group to participate and exercise practical training. In order to expand students' learning category and conform to each student's interest and requirement, there will have 2 to 4 groups in this course, and more than six students in one group. Teachers will combine visit, actual operation and active participation in the course. Students will have an achievement publish at the end of the semester.

description.zh:
為培養大學部學生自主學習能力，由學生主動積極創造並實現自己有興趣之主題。學生於特定主題之創造與實現中，學習到思考批判與問題解決等能力。教師擔任輔助指導角色，引導學生從實踐中學習問題解決能力。
    學生根據自己的興趣與能力訂定自主學習計畫，向指導教師提出計畫審查。指導教師同意後，學生於加退選週結束前向系辦公室登記申請。
description.en:
This course aims to develop undergraduates’ active learning skills by making students engage in the creation and realization of topics of students’ own interest. In the process of specific topic creation and realization, students will proactively learn critical-thinking and problem-solving skills. Instructors cultivate the active engagement of students in problem solving, without actually participating in it. 

In this course, students are required to draw up self-learning plans based on their own interests and capabilities, and submit to their instructors for approval. With instructors’ approval, they need to make registration to the departmental office for application by the end of the add/drop course selection weeks of the semester.

name.zh: 微型創業Ⅹ募資平台創客松
name.en: Foundations of Management and Entrepreneurship Ⅹ Crowdfunding Marker

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在教授學生創新創業的實務，與著名群眾募資平台flyingV合作，教導團隊如何將創意點子上募資平台必備知能與技巧，提供業師諮詢服務，藉由不同系所跨領域組成團隊，共同發想創業提案，最後進行產品DEMO發表，優秀團隊將做為106學年第2學期微型創業實戰課程之種子團隊，讓團隊作品可以實際接受市場考驗，瞭解創業甘苦。
description.en: This course aims to teach students entrepreneurship and innovation. Students will learn the techniques of showing their ideas on crowdfounding websites by cooperating with the famous crowdfunding team Flying V. In this course, students will have to cooperate with students from different field, and will be instructed by professional instructors. Students will have to team up, coming up with business proposals and publish samples. Outstanding teams will be the seed teams in 106-2 FME courses, which will have opportunities to experience running a business practically.

description.zh: 此課程中，針對微電影架構，進行系統性的介紹；並說明空拍機的操作，由經入史，從理論架構分析到個案演練，詳實地訓練，使學生能夠具備 微電影的設計與製作能力。
description.en: In this course, the introduction of the micro-film architecture is introduced systematically. The operation of the aerial filming machine is explained from the historical perspective, from the analysis of the theoretical framework to the case practice, and detailed training so that the students can have the design and production of the micro-movie ability.

description.zh:
飲食是人類族群最重要、最鮮明的文化體現，既易於滲透連結不同的產業，也是晚近海峽兩岸中小企業及個體創業風潮的大宗。北市做為全國首善之都，一飲一食的經營，考驗嚴峻。如何創意開發，管控品質，在同業隙縫中踹出新路？又如何在市場幻化間，穩健操盤化險為夷？本課程力邀北台灣食品企業業者，對詭譎前路的經營策略提點預習，並實地參訪觀摩，真切體察實戰，藉著取法乎上，令我年輕學子蓄積創業勇力，展現宏觀識見與恒毅意志。
     課程分為三部分：
一、	探索養生飲食時間學 / 飲食企業個案評比分析
二、	台茶品飲專場講座 / 佈局兩岸茶產業模式座談
三、	扎根台灣老牌綜合食品企業經營座談、參訪與體驗
description.en:
Food culture is one of the most important cultures of the human race.More and more SMEs and entrepreneurs in Taiwan tend to develop a variety of food products in recent years.As the capital of Taiwan, Taipei City faces the difficulty of diet culture evolution.
This course is divided into three parts: 
1.Explore the studies about healthy diet /Case analysis of Food Business.
2.Taiwan tea tasting seminar / the arrangement of Tea industry model.
3.Discussion of Taiwan senior comprehensive food business, with visit and experience.

description.zh: 課程主要分成5個部分：1.翡翠的定義2.翡翠與玉的差異3.翡翠的加工4.什麼是賭石?5.挑選正確的翡翠?透過課程以建立對於翡翠的基本概念。
description.en: There are five sections included in the course: 1. Definition of Jadeite. 2. Difference between jadeite and jade. 3. Jadeite processing. 4. What’s the gamble stone? 5. How to pick the right jadeite? Students could learn the basic concept of jadeite through the course.

description.zh: 飾品製作前，即使飾品的設計很重要，但是工藝(craft)，工法(skill)與工具的運用,需要更為熟悉。如何讓飾品的設計貼近人類?答案是創意思考，創意思考是來自於人、事物，例如動物、植物所演變的設計元素，或是來自於故事。文化創意是藉由多元的方式呈現出美感  ，其中飾品也是呈現文化創意之一的方式。透過課程讓學生更能夠了解金工(珠寶)的加工技術，並藉由創意來設計出文化的意涵
description.en: Before the production of jewelry, even if the design of jewelry is very important, but the craft, skill and the use of tools, need to be more familiar. How to make jewelry design closest to human? The answer is creative thinking, creative thinking is from the people, things, such as animals, plants evolved design elements, or from the story. Cultural creativity is by a variety of ways to show a sense of beauty, which jewelry is also a way to show cultural creativity Through the course so that students can better understand the metalworking (jewelry) processing technology, and by creative to design the meaning of culture.

description.zh:
內容包含光觸媒應用於環保科技、奈米技術與能源產業
本課程介紹光觸媒的基本材料，半導體光觸媒的晶體結構，光電化學概論，有許多運用如新能源、光催化觸媒、顯示器與生物檢測應用。此次課程將介紹最新的研究領域未來的發展方向。
description.en:
The main theme of this course is to present the basic science of semiconductor photocatalysis together with the various practical applications. This course covers fundamental principles and applicable techniques of light, solid state physics, electrochemistry, reaction kinetics, and materials processing. 
?	What is a Photocatalyst?
?	Principles of Light Over Solids
?	Principles of Semiconductors
?	Principles of Photoelectrochemistry
?	Photocatalyst Surface and Active Species
?	Kinetics and Mechanism in Photocatalysis
?	Methods for Improving Photocatalytic Activity
?	Fabrication of Practical Photocatalysts
?	Evaluation Methods of Reactivity
?	Future Applications of Photocatalysis.

name.zh: 區塊鏈智能合約與ICO發幣入門
name.en: Using Blockchain/Ethereum Tech and smart contract launch personalized and tradable tokens/ICO

description.zh:
這是為初學者設計的課程。有寫程式相關的經驗是一個優點，但不是必須的。課程將包括逐步指導，初探區塊鏈世界，創造私人以太坊節點並與之互動，到在該網路上發起新貨幣。預期的學習成果為在私人網絡和測試網絡上發起個性化且可交易的貨幣/ICO。將新貨幣發布到以太坊主網絡不是必須的，因為它需要真正的錢來購買Ether以支付部署所需的交易費用。（建議使用Mac或Linux系統）

註1. 區塊鏈以太坊技術變遷快速，本課程保留修改與變動權力
註2. 本課程內容以初探、學習為主，請同學切勿抱持錯誤期望修課
description.en: This is a course designed for beginners. Experiences with command line is a plus but not a must. The course will include step by step guide from opening and interacting with a private Ethereum node to launching a new token on top of the private network. The expected learning outcome would be having a personalized and tradable token on both private network and testnet for everyone. Deploying the token onto the main Ethereum network is optional since it requires real money to buy Ether for the token deployment transaction fee. (Using Mac OS and Linux is recommended)

description.zh: 先修課程：物理或負責教授同意。不可壓縮流體、質量不滅、非黏性流體之運動、柏努力定律、線性及角動量定理及其應用、渦流與勢流、黏性流、納維爾－史脫克斯方程式及應用、管中壓力頭損失及增加、邊界層與分離升力與阻力及雷諾方程式之應用。
description.en: Incompressible fluid, mass conservation, invoiced flow, Bernoulli principle, linear, angular momentum conservation and application, vortex, and potential flow, Navier-Stoke equation, pressure loss, boundary layer flow, separation flow, lift and drag, Reynold analogy and applications.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為讓學生可以利用暑期或其它時間至學校認可之校外公私立機構進行或參與實習，以增進學生之實務能力。學生於學校認可之校外機構實習總累計時數不得低於320小時。學生實習期滿後，應依據各系規定繳交相關實習相關成果報告，彙交所屬系保存，並作為成績核定之依據。學生校外實習學期成績之評定比例原則：實習單位占50%，輔導老師占50%，各系得依其屬性調整之。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to elevate an all-round ability for the students at NTUT. During the summer break　or other periods of time, students are required to go to government-based organizations or industry/business-oriented agencies with respect to promoting practice of ability. The course takers will need to stay in the same individual organization or agency with an accumulated amount of time of no less than 320 hours. After the students complete the requirements in question, these organizations and agencies will offer them certificates -- or proof of any kind -- in accordance with the real performance on site. The grading principle will be equivalently decided by the thesis advisor (50%) and the on-site organization or agency (50%), respectively. The individual department or graduate institute may make proper adjustments according to the situations in need.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為讓學生可以利用暑期或其它時間至學校認可之校外公私立機構進行或參與實習，以增進學生之實務能力。學生於學校認可之校外機構實習總累計時數不得低於320小時。學生實習期滿後，應依據各系規定繳交相關實習相關成果報告，彙交所屬系保存，並作為成績核定之依據。學生校外實習學期成績之評定比例原則：實習單位占50%，輔導老師占50%，各系得依其屬性調整之。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to elevate an all-round ability for the students at NTUT. During the summer break　or other periods of time, students are required to go to government-based organizations or industry/business-oriented agencies with respect to promoting practice of ability. The course takers will need to stay in the same individual organization or agency with an accumulated amount of time of no less than 320 hours. After the students complete the requirements in question, these organizations and agencies will offer them certificates -- or proof of any kind -- in accordance with the real performance on site. The grading principle will be equivalently decided by the thesis advisor (50%) and the on-site organization or agency (50%), respectively. The individual department or graduate institute may make proper adjustments according to the situations in need.

name.zh: CEO首部曲- 產業管理通識教育

description.zh: 透過CEO的觀點，學習跨領域的知識與產業應用
description.en: Guiding students to realize the industry domain and business requirements. Through the top manager view training to figure out the learning passionate to inspire inside potential.

name.zh: 塑膠材料特性與加工概論
name.en: Introduction to the characteristics and processing of plastic materials

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹塑膠材料特性與加工: 包含塑膠材料的特性與環保知識(泛用塑膠知識、泛用工程塑膠特性、塑膠材質回收辨識)，塑膠材料的添加劑，塑膠加工方法(射出成型與押出成型)，塑膠高分子合成與物化性。
description.en: This course mainly introduces the characteristics and processing of plastic materials: including the characteristics and environmental protection knowledge of plastic materials (general plastic knowledge, general-purpose engineering plastic characteristics, plastic material recycling identification), plastic material additives, plastic processing methods (injection molding and extrusion molding).
